author: Paweł Krupa (paulfantom)
message: apps/snmp: fix incorrect regex parse for volumeStatus
diff_snippet:
---FILE: apps/snmp/generator.yml---
@@ -64,12 +64,12 @@ modules:
           '':
             - regex: '0x476F6F64.*'  # Good
               value: 0
+            - regex: '0x5265616479.*' # Ready
+              value: 0
...
